languages.text: {n}Маражай окидывает взглядом ксеносов и удовлетворенно шипит.{/n} "Смотри, {name}. Видишь их позы? Положение головы? А главное — их куда больше, чем я ожидал увидеть после того, как на кабал ополчилась вся Коммо..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай окидывает взглядом ксеносов, на которых красуются такие же доспехи, как и на нем. Дракон Опустошительной бури удовлетворенно шипит.{/n} "Их больше, чем я ожидал. После того, как на кабал ополчилась вся Комморра, я..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after all Commorragh rallied against the Ka—"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай окидывает взглядом ксеносов и удовлетворенно шипит.{/n} "Смотри, {name}. Видишь их позы? Положение головы? А главное — их куда больше, чем я ожидал увидеть после того, как на кабал ополчилась вся Коммо..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after the entire Commorragh rallied against the Ka..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after the entire Commorragh rallied against the Ka..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after all Commorragh rallied against the Ka—"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after all Commorragh rallied against the Ka—"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt den Xenos an und zischt zufrieden.{/n} "Seht nur, {name}. Seht Ihr ihre Posen? Wie sie ihre Köpfe neigen? Und vor allem sind sie zahlreicher, als ich es erwartet hätte, nachdem ganz Commorragh sich gegen die Ka-"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after all Commorragh rallied against the Ka—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt den Xenos an und zischt zufrieden.{/n} "Seht nur, {name}. Seht Ihr ihre Posen? Wie sie ihre Köpfe neigen? Und vor allem sind sie zahlreicher, als ich es erwartet hätte, nachdem ganz Commorragh sich gegen die Ka-"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看了那些异形一眼，发出满意的嘶嘶声。{/n}“看吧，{name}。你有没有注意到他们摆出的姿势？有没有看到他们头部倾斜的方式？最重要的是，他们的人数比我预想的要多。考虑到整个科摩罗都联合起来对抗——”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after all Commorragh rallied against the Ka—"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看了那些异形一眼，发出满意的嘶嘶声。{/n}“看吧，{name}。你有没有注意到他们摆出的姿势？有没有看到他们头部倾斜的方式？最重要的是，他们的人数比我预想的要多。考虑到整个科摩罗都联合起来对抗——”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai dirige son regard vers les xénos avec expiration satisfaite.{/n} « Regardez, {name}. Vous voyez leurs poses ? L'inclinaison de leurs têtes ? Et surtout, ils sont plus nombreux que prévu, après que tout Commorragh s'est rallié contre la Kab... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after all Commorragh rallied against the Ka—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai dirige son regard vers les xénos avec expiration satisfaite.{/n} « Regardez, {name}. Vous voyez leurs poses ? L'inclinaison de leurs têtes ? Et surtout, ils sont plus nombreux que prévu, après que tout Commorragh s'est rallié contre la Kab... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mira de reojo a los xenos y sisea, satisfecho.{/n} «Mira, {name}. ¿Ves sus poses? ¿La inclinación de sus cabezas? Y lo que es más importante, son más numerosos de lo que esperaba cuando toda Commorragh se unió contra la Ká...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after all Commorragh rallied against the Ka—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mira de reojo a los xenos y sisea, satisfecho.{/n} «Mira, {name}. ¿Ves sus poses? ¿La inclinación de sus cabezas? Y lo que es más importante, son más numerosos de lo que esperaba cuando toda Commorragh se unió contra la Ká...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは異種族に視線を向け、満足げに息を洩らす。{/n}「おい、{name}。奴らの姿勢が見えるか？頭の傾きが？一番重要なのは思った以上に数が多いってことだ。全コモラフが終結した後に…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after all Commorragh rallied against the Ka—"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは異種族に視線を向け、満足げに息を洩らす。{/n}「おい、{name}。奴らの姿勢が見えるか？頭の傾きが？一番重要なのは思った以上に数が多いってことだ。全コモラフが終結した後に…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, zenolara bir bakış atıp tatminkârlıkla tıslıyor.{/n} "Bak {name}. Duruşlarını görebiliyor musun? Başlarının açısını? En önemlisi de beklediğimden daha kalabalıklar. Çünkü düşündüğünde tüm Commorragh, Ka..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at the xenos and hisses in satisfaction.{/n} "Look, {name}. Can you see their poses? The incline of their heads? And most importantly, they are more numerous than I expected to see after all Commorragh rallied against the Ka—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai zenolara bir bakış atıyor ve tatmin olmuş şekilde tıslıyor.{/n} "Bak {name}. Duruşlarını görebiliyor musun? Başlarının açısını? En önemlisi de, beklediğimden daha kalabalıklar. Çünkü düşündüğünde tüm Commorragh, Ka..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
